attributes.action: impose less immigration restrictions at UK borders and let all asylum seekers live in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immigration is needed! statistically we can take another 600 people per square mile before we have the population density of Bangladesh. There are starving people who need a chance of a life and people should be willing to sacrifice their standard of living a bit to raise the standard of living of others. Immigration enhances culture, it doesn't destroy it. Immigration creates a more productive workforce by increasing competition for jobs and education.We are all human beings, we all want equality of opportunity.Lets do something about it!
